snippet: To the Editor:    Re ''The Court Resurrects a Civil War-Era Ideal'' (Week in Review, May 23): It is unclear whether the Supreme Court is ready to overrule the Slaughter-House cases of 1873 and recognize the full meaning of the 14th Amendment's pri...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''The Court Resurrects a Civil War-Era Ideal'' (Week in Review, May 23): It is unclear whether the Supreme Court is ready to overrule the Slaughter-House cases of 1873 and recognize the full meaning of the 14th Amendment's privileges-or-immunities clause as conceived by its framers, but there is a broader lesson behind this issue.
abstract: Frank Scaturro letter on May 23 article on Supreme Court's ruling in California welfare case urges Court to revive 14th Amendment

headline.main: Schools Will Pay for Court Ruling; Rights and Preferences
